%title vim: include plugin doc
%template def_template
= vim doc 导入=
插件的DOC不会自动导入

需要进入DOC目录 运行 `:helptags .` 其中"."表示当前目录

如果插件装在别的路径下. 需要定义路径.比如`:helptags e:\dev\vimfiles\doc`

= install vim plug doc =
The doc of plugins will not installed by itself.

we need install it by ourself using `:helptags .`, "." means current directory.

it can also run as `:helptags e:\dev\vimfiles\doc`
